3: While we're still capable to keep fighting, I'd advise retreating for now, Commandant.
H-help...
Understood, Commandant.
It looks like a fight. It appears that the Support Force is fighting against...
We didn't do anything, I swear... Why are you attacking us?
I'll keep them away with my arrows.
Your ID... You're the one from Gray Raven, aren't you? And the Construct with you... is that Bianca?
What are you doing here?
I should be the one asking you. Why are you attacking the Support Force?
Because they looked terrified the moment they saw us and started running away.
That was because you guys all unholster your weapons... I thought you were going to...
To what?!
Enough! Isn't this the reason why the other Constructs are so terrified of the Purifying Force?
So what? We're now suspecting deserters in the Support Force, so get out of my face.

4: Is everyone from the Purifying Force as impulsive as you?

3: This isn't your jurisdiction, Gray Raven Commandant.
But it is. These people from the Support Force are on a joint operation with Gray Raven, so they're very much affiliated with the Gray Raven Commandant.
You're not letting Gray Raven challenge the Purifying Force, are you, Bianca?
Of course not, seeing that I'm also part of the Purifying Force. We can give it a shot right now—Purifying Force versus Purifying Force.
...Tch. Goddamn fence sitter.
That's why you're on a regular Task Force instead of fully here with us, isn't it? Fence sitter.

4: Do you feel proud attacking one of your own?

3: That's alright, Commandant. They're not going to do anything after we clarify the Purifying Force's stance.
So please follow my lead and be patient.
